availability.p: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

sourceDesc.p: Information about the source from which the event information was derived

body.note: Please fill in the type attribute value for the event element: bibliographical, biographical, cultural, literary, political, or social.

event.label: Label/title of the event
event.desc: Date or date-range of the event Please fill in the "when" attribute values for single dates or the "from" and "to" attributes for date ranges. Attribute values consisting of dates must be formatted as: YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD. (e.g., 2010, 2010-10, 2010-10-31) , location of the event Please link the location with a standardized geographical entity by looking up the GeoNames entry of your location and pasting its URL into the ref attribute of the placeName element. (e.g., the GeoNames link to Edmonton is the following: http://www.geonames.org/5946768/edmonton.html)

listBibl.bibl: Source of event description and/or note optional-delete list bibl if none; multiple sources-separate bibl tags
